Package com.juliewoolie.dom

package com.juliewoolie.dom
Document Object Model package. Provides DOM related interfaces. Delphi uses a DOM-like system, that does not fully comply with any DOM specification.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.juliewoolie.dom.event
    Document Object Model event system.
    com.juliewoolie.dom.style
    Provides interfaces CSS/SCSS for styling of documents.
